contributionDescription:
The Optimism Collective believes that building public goods should be rewarded.

This key ingredient to the Optimistic vision (opens new window)is more than just altruism – it’s core to our success. Optimism’s codebase itself is an open-source project, and builds on the shoulders of countless OSS giants which came before it.

This means public goods funding is a critical growth strategy. For Optimism, well-funded public goods means better developer tooling, widespread user education, safer infrastructure, and industry-leading research. It means Optimism can last and thrive.

Once we show that this model can drive a successful economy for the Optimism Collective, we can scale the principle of impact = profit to the world!RetroPGF is a core part of Optimism’s vision.
impactDescription:

pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for violating rules 2 (False statements & deception) and 11 (Spam). The applicant has simply copied generic information about the Optimism project and has not provided clear, original detail about their own project or specific contributions, and the impact metrics provided are unclear and seem unrelated.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application seems to be incorrectly categorized as "INDIVIDUAL". The contribution description and impact description are about an initiative called "Optimism Collective", implying this is a group effort or project rather than an individual contribution.
pwCategorySuggestions: Blockchain Infrastructure, Developer Ecosystem, Governance & Tokens
